title: Secrets Of The Garden

status: [Dominion VS Roll Short Stories] Secrets of the Garden ; [Reign VS Arial Short Story] Secrets of the Garden ; Secrets of the Garden ; [군림VS굴림 단편선] 정원의 비밀 ; [矛X盾短編選] 温室の秘密 ; 【矛X盾短編選】温室の秘密 ; 정원의 비밀
description:
Description :
        Jeongwon, who works as a gardener at the mansion, has been tamed by violent sex at the hands of her ex. One day, a mysterious package was delivered to the mansion. Jeongwon looks at the bandages that remind him of having sex with his ex, wondering if he was responsible. At this time, Gun-yi, who has a crush on him, asks about the identity of the courier. Jeongwon is embarrassed that his dirty secret will be revealed.
